title: Zettai Zetsubou Shoujo: Danganronpa Another Episode - Genocider Mode
original_name: 絶対絶望少女 ダンガンロンパ Another Episode ジェノサイダーモード
sinopse: Based on the game of the same name. This manga takes the events from the game and puts them in the point of view of the heroine(s) Fukawa Touko and Genocider Syo!
